---
name: Hemlock
type: Escort/1
speed: 15/20/30
turns: Special
shields: Holofields
armour: 4+
turrets: 0
notes:
  |
    A Hemlock class destroyer cannot initiate boarding actions. A ship that boards a Hemlock class destroyer gains a +l modifier in addition to any other modifiers.

    id: prow-pulsar-30-1
